Options.Name: Max Messages
Options.Description: The maximum number of messages allowed per time alotted.

Options.Name: Max Highlights
Options.Description: The maximum number of highlights allowed in a set period of time.

Options.Name: Time Threshold
Options.Description: The minimum time allowed for a set of messages in milliseconds.

Options.Name: Voice Response
Options.Description: Whether the nick should be devoiced on spam.

Options.Name: Kick Response
Options.Description: Whether the nick should be kicked on spam.

Options.Name: Ban Response
Options.Description: Whether the nick should be banned on spam.

Options.Name: Unban Response
Options.Description: Whether the nick should be unbanned after being banned.

Options.Name: Devoice Time
Options.Description: How long to be devoiced due to spam in seconds.

Options.Name: Unban Time
Options.Description: How long to be banned due to spam in seconds.
